item.description: If we have enough participants, we will begin the 6 week series entitled, 'Introduction to Meditation and Mysticism.' Join us to learn the spiritual tools and practices of Christian Mysticism!
item.how_to_find_us: Stonybrook t-stop on the orange line; 200 Amory is the 2nd house on the right when you turn left onto Amory from the t-station
item.name: Intro to Meditation and Mysticism -Potential Start Date
